definitions.definition: An other, another (person, etc), more often rendered as another.
definitions.example: I'm afraid little Robbie does not always play well with others.

definitions.definition: The other one; the second of two.
definitions.example: One boat is not better than the other.

definitions.definition: To regard, label or treat as an "other", as not part of the same group; to view as different and alien.
To treat as different or separate; segregate; ostracise.

definitions.example: I treat others like I treat myself.

definitions.definition: Those remaining after one or more people or items have left, or done something else, or been excluded.
definitions.example: Two decided to hide, the others surrendered.   I kept two special jars and threw away all the others.
